reviews.text: Location of hotel is excellent for a traveller, exit 7 is nearest from City Hall Subway line 1 or 2. Airport limo stops outside the back of the Plaza Hotel which is opposite the Hotel Aropa. Plenty of restaurants around to choose from aswell as bakeries, coffee shops and convenience stores. Less than 10 mins walk to Myeongdung, Namsan Cable Car, Cheonggyecheon Stream and Gwanghwamun Plaza where you can view/walk to the Palace and the Blue House.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel centrally located

reviews.text: Staff spoke English and were polite. Rooms were spacious enough and clean.
reviews.title: Great Location, Value for Price and many local restaurants

reviews.text: We love the hotel location, so close to Myeongdong, Namdaemun and walking distance to Gyeongbok Palace, Cheongyeon stream, etc. Many restaurants around the hotel area just behind the street and there's 7-11 (24hrs store) just right outside the hotel cafe. It is worth the price for the spacious room that comes with King Size bed and bathtub. Thou toilet a bit small, its still worth the price we are paying. Close to City Hall station (interchange to most attractions such as Hongik, Sinchon Uni, Noryanjin Fish market, Yongsan Spa). To reach the hotel, exit 7.
reviews.title: enjoyable stay, good.city hotel
Great staff, good location, clean and spacious room

reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay with this hotel as it is located to major shopping areas and also easily accessible to public transportation, subway station is just 3 minutes walk away. Also there are some local restaurants just in front of the hotel and they serves good quality local delicacies. The surrounding area is also very quiet at night, no major noise pollution. Fast check-in and out. Staffs can speak both English and Mandarin, friendly and know their way around Seoul for free-and-easy travelers like me.
reviews.title: Great place, nice and clear room in best location
